#summary The OWL Versioning API

= Introduction =

Here you will find documentation on the distributed versioning implementation of OWL ontologies.

= Concepts =

The ontology is set of axioms. Modifications to an ontology amount to adding and removing axioms from that set. Or adding/removing imports or prefixes or annotations, which are extra-logical things that are simple structured elements nevertheless. A list of such modifications is a *ChangeSet*. Note that even though we call it a set it's actually a list. That's because the order of changes matters.
